query:
SELECT 
  prefecture,
  city,
  COUNT(*) as aggregated_count,
  SUM(transaction_count) as total_transactions,
  AVG(avg_price_per_sqm) as avg_price
FROM real_estate_aggregated
WHERE prefecture = '神奈川県' AND city LIKE '%戸塚%'
GROUP BY prefecture, city
LIMIT 10;
